page.title: 19SANDY TWINNING ASSOCIATION
page.content: SANDY TWINNING ASSOCIATION WHICH IS ORGANISED AND FINANCED BY ITS MEMBERS HAS BEEN INVOLVED IN TWINNING WITH MALAUNAY IN NORMANDY, NORTHERN FRANCE, FOR ABOUT FIVE YEARS. THE AIMS OF THE ASSOCIATION ARE TO PROMOTE FRIENDSHIP AND UNDERSTANDING BETWEEN THE PEOPLE OF SANDY AND MALAUNAY AND TO ENCOURAGE VISITS BETWEEN THE TWO TOWNS PARTICULARLY BY YOUNG PEOPLE, AND BY SO DOING TO BROADEN THE MUTUAL UNDERSTANDING OF CULTURAL RECREATIONAL EDUCATIONAL AND COMMERCIAL ACTIVITIES. THE TWINNING WORKS ON A BASIS OF "HOSTING" OF FAMILIES SO THAT SANDY PEOPLE STAY WITH FAMILIES IN MALAUNAY AND VICE VERSA. APPROX. A HUNDRED FAMILIES FROM SANDY AND SURROUNDING VILLAGES ARE ACTIVELY INVOLVED. SANDY ROYAL BRITISH LEGION ALSO HAVE LINKS WITH THE "ANCIENS COMBATTANTS" OF MALAUNAY.
